H0.text: Bifocal lens was invented by Benjamin Franklin.

H1.text: Telescope lens was invented by Benjamin Franklin.

H2.text: Telephone was invented by Benjamin Franklin.

H3.text: Camera was invented by Benjamin Franklin.

A4.text: Benjamin Franklin is generally credited with the invention of bifocals.

A5.text: the evidence implies, however, that when he sought to order lenses of this type the London opticians were already familiar with them.
